verses.verse: Now these are the commandments<WH4687>, the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> to teach<WH3925> you<WH6213>, that you might do them in the land<WH776> where you go<WH5674> to possess it<WH3423>:

That you might fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, to keep<WH8104> all his statutes<WH2708> and his commandments<WH4687>, which I command<WH6680> you<WH1121>, you, and your son, and your son<WH1121>'s son<WH1121>, all the days<WH3117> of your life<WH2416>; and that your days<WH3117> may be prolonged<WH748>.

Hear<WH8085> therefore<WH3478>, O Israel, and observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> it<WH3190>; that it may be well with you<WH7235>, and that you may increase mightily<WH3966>, as the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1> has promised<WH1696> you<WH776>, in the land that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.
Hear<WH8085>, O Israel<WH3478>: The Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> is one<WH259> Lord<WH3068>:
And you shall love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart<WH3824>, and with all your soul<WH5315>, and with all your might<WH3966>.
And these words<WH1697>, which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, shall be in your heart<WH3824>:

And you shall teach them diligently<WH8150> unto your sons<WH1121>, and shall talk<WH1696> of them when you sit<WH3427> in your house<WH1004>, and when you walk<WH3212> by the way<WH1870>, and when you lie down<WH7901>, and when you rise up<WH6965>.
And you shall bind<WH7194> them for a sign<WH226> upon your hand<WH3027>, and they shall be as frontlets<WH2903> between your eyes<WH5869>.
And you shall write<WH3789> them upon the door-posts<WH4201> of your house<WH1004>, and on your gates<WH8179>.

And it shall be<WH3068>, when the Lord your God<WH430> shall have brought<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which he swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, to Abraham<WH85>, to Isaac<WH3327>, and to Jacob<WH3290>, to give<WH5414> you great<WH1419> and good<WH2896> cities<WH5892>, which you built not<WH1129>,

And houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of all good<WH2898> things<WH4390>, which you fill not<WH953>, and wells dug<WH2672>, which you dig<WH2672> not<WH3754>, vineyards and olive trees<WH2132>, which you plant<WH5193> not<WH398>; when you shall have eaten and be full<WH7646>;
Then beware<WH8104> lest you forget<WH7911> the Lord<WH3068>, which brought you forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, from the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
You shall fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and serve<WH5647> him<WH7650>, and shall swear by his name<WH8034>.
You shall not go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, of the gods<WH430> of the people<WH5971> which are round about you<WH5439>;

(For the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> is a jealous<WH7067> God<WH410> among<WH7130> you<WH639>) lest the anger of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> be kindled<WH2734> against you<WH8045>, and destroy you from off the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.
You shall not tempt<WH5254> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as you tempted<WH5254> him in Massah<WH4532>.
You shall diligently<WH8104> keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, and his testimonies<WH5713>, and his statutes<WH2706>, which he has commanded you<WH6680>.

And you shall do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> and good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068>: that it may be well<WH3190> with you<WH935>, and that you may go in and possess<WH3423> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>,
To cast out<WH1920> all your enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> you<WH3068>, as the Lord has spoken<WH1696>.

And when your son<WH1121> asks<WH7592> you in time to come<WH4279>, saying<WH559>, What mean the testimonies<WH5713>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> has commanded you<WH6680>?

Then you shall say<WH559> unto your son<WH1121>, We were Pharaoh<WH6547>'s bondmen<WH5650> in Egypt<WH4714>; and the Lord<WH3068> brought us out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>:

And the Lord<WH3068> showed<WH5414> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159>, great<WH1419> and severe<WH7451>, upon Egypt<WH4714>, upon Pharaoh<WH6547>, and upon all his household<WH1004>, before our eyes<WH5869>:
And he brought us out<WH3318> from there<WH935>, that he might bring us in, to give<WH5414> us the land<WH776> which he swore<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1>.

And the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> us to do<WH6213> all these statutes<WH2706>, to fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430>, for our good<WH2896> always<WH3117>, that he might preserve us alive<WH2421>, as it is at this day<WH3117>.
And it shall be our righteousness<WH6666>, if we observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all these<WH2063> commandments<WH4687> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430>, as he has commanded us<WH6680>.
